segments.text: Our company's wei-ya is tomorrow night ! It's your first Chinese New Year in Taiwan--you must be excited !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excited ? What's there to be excited about ? It's just another company dinner , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have no idea ! There's a banquet with prizes , performances ... you name it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I heard that last year Vivian from accounting won a new car !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , really ! And she told me the secret to winning , wear red underwear !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wear red underwear ? ! Does that really work ? Are you going to try it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course ! I'm not only going to wear red underwear , but I'm going to wear red socks and a red shirt , too !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gee , I don't think I own any red underwear , but I can buy some !
segments.speaker: S2
